text:
Tourmaline Labs | Senior backend developer | Downtown San Diego, CA | Full-time, Onsite

Tourmaline Labs is currently processing driving data from 92 countries, using machine learning and AI techniques to discover insights into how people can become better drivers, how cities can learn from aggregate drive data to increase throughput and decrease accidents.

Our stack includes Node.js, MySQL(Aurora), PostGIS, Kinesis, sundry AWS services

Our user count is growing fast and there is lots of exciting work.

Link to apply: https://www.tourmalinelabs.com/careers
